page.title: 08Shilton Stores/Post Office
page.content: The{Shop and Post Office}has been owned by{Mr Thom}for the past{11 years .It is the only shop in the area. Most people shop in{Coventry. These are some of the items the shop stocks frozen food,sweets,canned food,milk,tea,sugar,cigarettes,toys, cough mixtures and cereals. The shop opens 09.00 every weekday, shuts at{17-30,}except for{Wed(13-00) and{Sat(12-30).}Inside the shop were shelves, a fridge and a freezer where frozen food is stored. Mr Thom sorts out the mail for {Shilton,Barnacle}and{Ansty}early each morning to be delivered to the 3 areas.His busiest day in the post office is Thursday, which is the main pensions day.In the post office he deals mainly with{Pensions,Family {Allowances,Telephone Accounts and {National Insurance Stamps.
